name: Mighty Weapons
description:
An adventure 2D platformers, where the game gives you choice to play with either sword or shield. If you choose sword, you can only attack enemies. If you choose shield, you can only deflect projectiles to kill some enemies only.

The game has only 2 levels for now.

Controls:

  • AD / Arrow Keys (Keyboard) and D Pad (Gamepad) to move left and right
  • Up Arrow/ Space(Keyboard) and D Pad Up/ B (Gamepad) to jump
  • Left Click(Mouse), E/Num Pad 0 (Keyboard) and B (Gamepad) to use weapon.
